raw_response: {"answer_index": 0, "answer_text": "Repeat blood cultures now", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "This patient has classic signs of infective endocarditis (history of IV drug use, fever, new murmur, positive blood cultures for Staphylococcus aureus). Early repeat cultures also help guide management and assess clearance of bacteremia."}
